full_text:
In the Court of the Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate,
Thiruvananthapuram
Present: Elsa Catherine George
Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate.
Tuesday the 4" day of March 2025
CC: 213/2025
Complainant : State represented by the Sub Inspector of Police,
Poojappura Police Station Crime No. 1411/2024.
(By A.P.P )
Accused . Nikhil A.S, 21 years, S/o Anil Kumar, Roadarikathu
Veedu, Abrakuzhi, Moonamoodu, Vattiyoorkkavu
P.O, Kaachani Ward, Peroorkkada Village.
(By Adv. Sri.Sreeraj S Pai — Legal Aid Defence
Counsel)
Charge : Offence punishable u/s 303(2) of BNS
Plea : Guilty
Finding : Guilty
Sentence/order Accused is found guilty of the offence u/s 303(2) of
BNS and is convicted thereunder. Accused is
sentenced to undergo Rigorous Imprisonment for a
period of 8 months for the offence u/s 303(2) of
BNS. Set off allowed w.e.f 20/11/2024.
This case having been finally heard on today the court on the same day delivered the
following :-
JUDGMENT
1. This is a case charge sheeted by the Sub Inspector of Police, Poojappura Police
Station Crime No. 1411/2024 against the accused alleging commission of offences
ws 303(2) of BNS.
2. The case of the prosecution as revealed from the final report is that on 15/11/2024 at
sometime between 8 am and 8.40 am, the accused committed theft of Honda Activa

2
scooter bearing registration No. KL-21-N-1511 which was parked in the
premises of defacto complainant’s house at Kairali Nagar in Thirumala Village
and thereby committed the offence as alleged against him.

3. Accused produced. He is under custody from 20/11/2024. Legal Aid Defence
Counsel is present. Accused filed petition to plead guilty. Hence, charge for
the offences u/s 303(2) of BNS was framed, read over and explained to the
accused to which he pleaded guilty. The plea is voluntarily made, with proper
legal assistance and after fully understanding the consequences thereof. The
accused is found guilty of the offence u/s 303(2) of BNS and is convicted
thereunder. Heard the accused on the question of sentence u/s 271(2) of
BNSS.

4. Accused pleaded for leniency and prayed for set off for the period under
custody. Accused is sentenced to undergo Rigorous Imprisonment for a period
of 8 months for the offence ws 303(2) of BNS. Set off allowed w.e.f
20/11/2024.

5. Property produced in this case as T 441/2024 Honda Activa bearing
registration No. KL-21-N-1511 and key released on interim custody shall
hereby made absolute.

Dictated to the Confidential Assistant, transcribed and typed by her, corrected
and pronounced by me in open Court on this the 4" day of March 2025.
SEIN
Elsa Catherine George,
ta a3 Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate,
. \G ey oo Thiruvananthapuram .
